short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for twitter that gives you the option to also post to lens protocol

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reroot is an extension that allows users to cross-post to lens protocol without having to leave the twitter app. Instead of clicking "Tweet" to post, users can click the lens button that will prompt them to connect their wallet, show a preview of their post, and sign a transaction to post to lens. Once the transaction is confirmed, the post is tweeted.

WalletConnect is used to connect to the user's wallet and sign transactions to post.
